source.name: Common use case for GPT-3
source.instructions: Which of the following is NOT a common use case for GPT-3?

answers.answer: Generating natural language text for a given topic
Automating customer support tasks such as FAQs and customer service emails
Generating lyrics for songs and poems

source.guidance: GPT-3 is primarily a natural language processing AI and does not specialize in solving complex mathematical problems. Its main uses involve tasks related to generating and understanding human language.
